title: SOLD: T215-2 Red Cross Tobacco Type 2 Hal Chase 1 of 1
author: calvindog

posts.post_title: SOLD: T215-2 Red Cross Tobacco Type 2 Hal Chase 1 of 1
posts.post_content:
As rare of a Hal Chase card that there is.  Just one graded by SGC and PSA combined -- and this is it.  Not the more common type 1 version from 1910 - 1912, this one is the rare type 2 version from 1912-13.  

[URL="http://www.flickr.com/photos/calvindog/4113198752/"][IMG]http://farm3.staticflickr.com/2589/4113198752_5b2208e285_o.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
